vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.39;
son of: Helez (H2503H);
father of: Sismai (H5581)
§ Elasah or Eleasah = "God has made"
1) a descendant of Judah, son of Helez
2) a priest of Pashur's line with a foreign wife during Ezra's time
3) Shaphan's son, Zedekiah's servant
4) a descendant of Benjamin, son of Rapha, father of Azel
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá; (c)   hijo de Rafá; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   sacerdote; en tiempos de Esdras; (e)   hijo de Safán; funcionario; en tiempos de Sedequías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利亞撒 或 以利亞薩 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神已成就" (和 0499 不同)
1) 猶大的後裔, 希利斯的兒子 ( #代上 2:39| )
2) 巴施戶珥的子孫, 在以斯拉時代作祭司, 其妻為一個外邦女子 ( #拉 10:18-25| )
3) 沙番的兒子, 西底家王的臣僕 ( #耶 29:3| )
4) 便雅閔的後裔, 拉法的兒子, 亞悉的父親 (代上 8:37| )
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利亚撒 或 以利亚萨 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神已成就" (和 0499 不同)
1) 犹大的后裔, 希利斯的儿子 ( #代上 2:39| )
2) 巴施户珥的子孙, 在以斯拉时代作祭司, 其妻为一个外邦女子 ( #拉 10:18-25| )
3) 沙番的儿子, 西底家王的臣仆 ( #耶 29:3| )
4) 便雅闵的后裔, 拉法的儿子, 亚悉的父亲 (代上 8:37| )

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.37;
son of: Binea (H1150);
brother of: Raphah (H7498) and Azel (H0682A);
father of: Ulam (H0198H), Jeush (H3266I) and Eliphelet (H0467J); also called Eshek at 1Ch.8.39;
Also named: e.sheq (עֵ֫שֶׁק "Eshek" H6232)
§ Elasah or Eleasah = "God has made"
1) a descendant of Judah, son of Helez
2) a priest of Pashur's line with a foreign wife during Ezra's time
3) Shaphan's son, Zedekiah's servant
4) a descendant of Benjamin, son of Rapha, father of Azel

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.22
§ Elasah or Eleasah = "God has made"
1) a descendant of Judah, son of Helez
2) a priest of Pashur's line with a foreign wife during Ezra's time
3) Shaphan's son, Zedekiah's servant
4) a descendant of Benjamin, son of Rapha, father of Azel

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.29.3;
son of: Shaphan (H8227B);
brother of: Ahikam (H0296) and Gemariah (H1587H)
§ Elasah or Eleasah = "God has made"
1) a descendant of Judah, son of Helez
2) a priest of Pashur's line with a foreign wife during Ezra's time
3) Shaphan's son, Zedekiah's servant
4) a descendant of Benjamin, son of Rapha, father of Azel
